rule.name: Methods with too many parameters
rule.code: warnif count > 0 from method in JustMyCode.Methods where method.NbParameters > 8

rule.name: Too many lines in method
rule.code: warnif count > 0 from method in JustMyCode.Methods where method.NbLinesOfCode > 150
rule.description: Methods that are longer than 150 characters
